It's been a while since you've satisfied your urges to repulse and rape other pokemon, so you're eager to get out and find a new victim. Then again, you are particularly hungry today, perhaps you'll order some take out and just violate whoever shows up to deliver it?

Taking a heavy handed swig of your liquor and letting out another belch, you decide to...
14532.title: Gross, Gassy, Gluttonous Gardevoir

145321.content:
Standing up, your rolls of fat shake and quiver as you stretch your arms, letting out a wafting fart from the exertion. It's been too long since you've had some fun in the forest, you've decided. So you endeavor to head outside, your arms raised up to let the sweaty stench of your armpits leak into the air.

Strolling through the forest, you notice several other Pokemon, all avoiding you and your foul stench like the plague. An innocent Ratatta accidentally steps into your path, and comes close enough to smell your putrid feet. The pathetic thing is paralyzed by the smell, and turns a pale green, before you playfully kick him aside. The smell was clearly too much, because as you walk away you hear it vomiting in the bushes.

You pass under a small clasp of trees, and cut a rancid fart that blows your stained dress backwards. You crudely snort, and laugh as the noxious odor drifts upwards. A hapless Pidgey caught in the cloud nearly has a heart attack, before falling out of the branches, mouth foaming and eyes rolled into its head. Nothing could take a whiff of you and walk away the same, so nearly everyone avoided you. It's just one of the benefits of being the queen of stink, as many Pokemon have taken to calling you.

As you walk along, you reach a hand down into your crack to scratch an itch between your cheeks, moaning in a disgusting manner at your filthy pleasures. Then, for no reason other than to be as disgusting as possible, you sniff your soiled hand, taking great joy in the ungodly stench stuck to it. As if you cap off your filthy fun, you manage to lean down and cut a god awful fart. The fumes pour out of your anus like a pressurized tank, and the odor is something to behold. Anything fifty feet behind you is probably gasping for breath now, only to choke on your butt air. You proudly pat your rumbling stomach, and smile. Now would be a perfect time to relax and enjoy your work, when you heard something rustling in the foliage beside you.

"Shh, please, shh!" Something's talking in the bush beside you, "Shh, she'll hear you!"

A sly grin crosses your face, you know exactly what to do to get the out of hiding. You face away from the shrub, and flip your dress up over your back, exposing your fetid butt. Then you carefully spread your slimy asscheeks and blast a deadly, wet fart, knocking most of the leaves off the bush. There is a lot of hacking and wheezing, and after merely a moment, two Oddishes and a Belossom fall out of the bush, about to puke.

The Belossom looks up at you, tears in her eyes, "Why are you doing this? Please just leave my daughters alone! They've done nothing!"

"Shut up!" You growl, as if you had any concern for what she had to say. Your eyes begin to glow, and each of the plant types finds itself on their back, tethered to the ground with psychic energy.

"Now open wide," You snicker, "Because it's time to...
145321.title: Reach out and touch someone!

choices: Lay down and let me sit on your face...
145322.content:
You stand up, still dripping of your own piss. You stretch and give a yawn, your hefty stomach shaking with the movement. You look around, realizing that you laid sleeping in urine all day, and its around three in the afternoon. Your stomach groans in agony, begging for food. You cock one leg in the air, and rip a fart. The smell of your own flatulence gets you drooling, not to mention a little randy below the belt. You grab the telephone across the room and lick your lips, dialing the number of one of the chinese restaurants nearby, the one you haven't gotten banned from for public indecency and sexual harassment yet.

"Yes, hello? Typhlosion Takeout?" Your speaking always sounds funny, partially because of your fat cheeks, and because of your constantly drooling mouth, "I need two orders, no three orders of garlic dumplings, fried scallions, and your extra-spicy Combusken wings, ASAP!"

The operator on the other side mumbled, "Yeah, yeah, anything else fat-ass?"

You grunted angrily at his remark, so much so that you farted again, loudly. Even he must have heard it, because the other side suddenly got very quiet. You smile, quite proud of your flatulence, and said, "Yeah, as a matter of fact, make it two orders of scallions, and throw in a Togepi roll and a three-liter of lemonade. Got it?"

"Uh.. yeah." The operator was clearly shaken up, "That'll be fifty-nine sixty. Your address?"

You quickly give the terrified worker your address and hang up. Now it's time to wait, so you flop down onto your couch and grab a large bag of chips and your bottle of scotch. Drinking and eating were always fun, plus they provided fuel for your habits. The liquor goes right through you, and while you're shoveling sour cream and onion chips down your throat, you piss yourself. The warmth quickly spreads through your couch cushions, the couch already stained with numerous other foul smelling fluids.

A few minutes later, you hear a knock on your door, the delivery boy.

"Wow, that's quick," You think to yourself, unlocking the door with your psychic powers. The delivery girl, as it turns out to be, is a pint sized Spinda with a bright face and a chipper smile. You'll have fun changing that. Under her arm, she's carrying your order in a large paper bag, and in her other hand she has your receipt, which she gleefully reads out loud,

"Three orders of garlic dumplings, two orders fried scallions, Combusken wings, Togepi roll, and a three liter lemonade, all right here!" She steps inside to hand you the food, "That'll be Fifty-nine sixty ma'am, will that be cash or..."

She stops suddenly, crinkling her nose. The smell of your abode hits her hard, and she is instantly repulsed. Her paws are wet too, and she looks down to find she's standing in your piss puddle from earlier. Before she could scream, or vomit(which she was more likely to do) you use your powers to slam the door behind her shut. You take a good look at your captive, and savor the look of fear in her eyes. You cut another fart, only thickening the choking cloud of stench around you. The Spinda should run, but she is too paralyzed from your almighty stink.

"Listen good, twerp," You smile and say, "I want some entertainment while I eat. So you're going to come over here and...

info.brief_description: For all your disgusting Pokemon needs. Sex and drugs added as a bonus!
info.description:
Alright, so, this story is obviously made for those who like the nasty stuff, and, well, Pokemon.
There can be pretty much anything in this...
Vore, Scat, Watersports, Sweat, Feet, Bad Smell, Fart, Belch, Armpits, Vomit, Snot...
You name it!
It takes a lot to gross me out, so, don't be afraid to make something really disgusting happen! Obviously, this story isn't for those with weak stomachs.
One thing, though...
The ones doing the disgusting stuff need to be FEMALE!
No herms, no males, females!
I don't mind if there are some males or herms in the story, but they should NOT be the 'main' characters, and should NOT do any of the disgusting things. That's all I ask.
There can be sex, there can be violence, there can be blood, drugs, things like that, whatever you like!
The time when Pokemon were cute is over... Violence, drugs and disgusting things will change everything.
Also, please note that I'd want you to use 'She' and 'her' instead of 'You' and 'Your'. The reader isn't the character, they're just looking at the life of another creature and choose what happen to it, not what happens to them. So, when the creature does something, don't make it sound like the creature's the reader, please.
Thanks, and now, enjoy the story!
